name: Shell Spirax S2 TX
description: High Performance, API GL-4 Tractor Transmission and Hydraulic Oil

marketing: Shell Spirax S2 TX is a high quality “universal tractor transmission oil” (UTTO) designed for use in transmission, differential, hydraulic and oil immersed brakes as well as power takeoff systems of agricultural tractors and off-road equipment.
